meanings.meaning: 1. absurd; unreasonable; nonsensical; preposterous; incoherent Usually written using kana alone
2. extreme; senseless; reckless; wanton Usually written using kana aloneオラ気分が良くなったで。でもよ、おとうさんに滅茶苦茶怒られちまうと思うべさ。I feel a lot better now, but I know Dad's going to be real upset.
3. disorderly; chaotic; confused; messy Usually written using kana aloneその地震は何もかもめちゃくちゃにした。The earthquake smashed everything.
4. incredibly; really; so; super Usually written using kana alone

meanings.meaning: 1. absurd; unreasonable; ridiculous むっちゃ is dialectal君がそれをたった一人でやろうなんてむちゃだ。You are mad to try to do it all alone.
2. rash; reckless 冬にその山に登るなんて彼は無茶だ。He'd be crazy to climb the mountain in winter.
3. excessive; immoderate; extreme 無茶しなければよかった。I shouldn't have overdone it.
4. very; extremely; excessively Kansai dialect, See also めっちゃ
無茶 【むっちゃ】
無茶: Ateji (phonetic) reading. 無茶: Ateji (phonetic) reading.
